# animatedValueType

**Instance Property**

A value that defines the type that the action animates, if the action animates a target value.

## Declaration

```swift
var animatedValueType: (any AnimatableData.Type)? { get }
```

## Discussion

In your implementation, return a type that matches the action animation’s bind target.

For example if the action animates a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Transform], return `Transform.self` in your implementation, and set the action animation’s bind target to  [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BindTarget/transform] when creating an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/AnimationResource] with `AnimationResource.makeActionAnimation(...)`.
